info.name: Seedr Dark Mode
info.description: A dark theme for Seedr.cc with red and blue highlight color and reworked borders, for a sleek modern design.
info.additionalInfo: 2018-08-08: Fixed navigation color and search bar on Tutorials site 2018-08-08: Fixed backround color on Tutorials site 2017-10-05: Changed Torrent Status Indicator Warning (for low amount of seeders) to display without borders and in red color -------------------------------- Based on the Soft Dark Design from L11K with many improvements to make it a completely dark theme. Modals, buttons and progress bars as well as the subscription management, about and terms sites are now dark. Some borders were also removed to give the site a sleek modern look.
